description: ToneDen automates social media campaigns, advertising, and landing pages, particularly for music promoters and event organizers looking to boost audience reach

tools.name: TONEDEN_CREATE_ATTACHMENT
tools.description: Tool to create an attachment. Use when you need to programmatically create a social unlock or contest attachment after gathering all required parameters.

type.title: Type
type.description: Attachment type: 'unlock' for social unlock or 'contest' for a contest attachment.

platform.title: Platform
platform.description: Social action for single-action attachments. Required when type='unlock' and only one social action.

platforms.title: Platforms
platforms.description: List of social actions for multi-action attachments. Required when type='contest' or multiple unlock actions.

unlock_text.title: Unlock Text
unlock_text.description: Coupon code text to display. Required when unlock_type='coupon'.

unlock_type.title: Unlock Type
unlock_type.description: Reward type for social unlocks. Required when type='unlock'.

download_url.title: Download Url
download_url.description: URL of the file to download or link target. Required when unlock_type='download' or 'link'.

messenger_page_id.title: Messenger Page Id
messenger_page_id.description: Facebook Page ID to subscribe on Messenger. Required when platform='facebook-messenger'.

stream_unlock_url.title: Stream Unlock Url
stream_unlock_url.description: URL of the unlisted video to stream. Required when unlock_type='stream'.

tools.name: TONEDEN_CREATE_LINK
tools.description: Tool to create a ToneDen link. Use when you have the target_type and, if needed, the services array. Supports creation of links for music, podcast, livestream, event, tour, biglink, fundraiser, smartlink, and custom types.

inputSchema.title: CreateLinkRequest

services.title: Services
services.description: Conditionally required array of service-specific objects; required for target_types: music, podcast, livestream, tour, biglink; must be omitted for event, fundraiser, smartlink, custom.

target_type.title: Target Type
target_type.description: Determines the link landing page type.

inputSchema.description: Request model for creating a ToneDen link.

tools.name: TONEDEN_DELETE_ADVERTISING_CAMPAIGN
tools.description: Deletes a ToneDen advertising campaign by ID using DELETE /advertising/campaigns/{campaignID}.

inputSchema.title: DeleteAdvertisingCampaignRequest

campaignID.title: Campaign Id
campaignID.description: ID of the advertising campaign to delete. Accepts string or int.

inputSchema.description: Request model for deleting a ToneDen advertising campaign by ID.

tools.name: TONEDEN_DELETE_LINK
tools.description: Deletes a ToneDen link by ID using DELETE /links/{linkID}.

inputSchema.title: DeleteLinkRequest

link_id.title: Link Id
link_id.description: ID of the link to delete. Accepts string or int.

inputSchema.description: Request model for deleting a ToneDen link by ID.

tools.name: TONEDEN_DELETE_PLAYBOOK_CAMPAIGN
tools.description: Deletes a ToneDen playbook campaign by ID using DELETE /playbooks/campaigns/{campaignID}.

inputSchema.title: DeletePlaybookCampaignRequest

campaign_id.title: Campaign Id
campaign_id.description: ID of the playbook campaign to delete. Accepts string or int.

inputSchema.description: Request model for deleting a ToneDen playbook campaign by ID.

tools.name: TONEDEN_EXPAND_LINK_TEMPLATE
tools.description: Tool to expand a ToneDen link template. Use when you need to retrieve the full template link with your tracking pixels and optional service links. Provide a URL to generate platform services for music or podcast content.

inputSchema.title: ExpandLinkTemplateRequest

url.title: Url
url.description: Optional source URL for music or podcast; when provided, the API generates a services array linking to that track across platforms.

inputSchema.description: Request model for expanding a ToneDen link template.

tools.name: TONEDEN_GET_ADVERTISING_CAMPAIGN
tools.description: Retrieve a specific advertising campaign by its ID using ToneDen's API. Endpoint: GET /advertising/campaigns/{campaignID} Notes: - This endpoint does not require a userID in the path per anthropic docs. - Some accounts may not have advertising access; in such cases, non-2xx responses are still returned here for observability instead of raising, so the caller can inspect the error object.

campaignID.title: Campaign Id
campaignID.description: The ID of the advertising campaign to retrieve.

tools.name: TONEDEN_GET_ADVERTISING_CAMPAIGN_CREATIVE_INSIGHTS
tools.description: Retrieve creative performance insights for a specific advertising campaign using ToneDen's API. Endpoint: GET /advertising/campaigns/{campaignID}/creativeInsights. Note: Endpoint uses camelCase `creativeInsights` per anthropic docs.

campaignID.title: Campaign Id
campaignID.description: The ID of the advertising campaign to retrieve creative insights for.

tools.name: TONEDEN_GET_ADVERTISING_CAMPAIGN_INSIGHTS
tools.description: Retrieve performance insights for a specific advertising campaign using ToneDen's API. Endpoint: GET /advertising/campaigns/{campaignID}/insights.

campaignID.title: Campaign Id
campaignID.description: The ID of the advertising campaign to retrieve insights for.

tools.name: TONEDEN_GET_ATTACHMENT
tools.description: Tool to retrieve an attachment by ID. Use when you need to fetch details of an existing attachment by its ID.

attachmentID.title: Attachment Id
attachmentID.description: The unique identifier of the attachment to retrieve.

tools.name: TONEDEN_GET_ATTACHMENT_ENTRIES_TIME_SERIES
tools.description: Tool to fetch time-series entry statistics for a specific attachment. Use when you need chronological entry data points for an attachment.

attachmentID.title: Attachment Id
attachmentID.description: The unique identifier of the attachment for which to retrieve entry time-series data.

tools.name: TONEDEN_GET_ATTACHMENT_ENTRIES_TOTALS
tools.description: Tool to fetch summary counts of entries for an attachment. Use when you need aggregate entry counts over day, week, month, and lifetime.

attachmentID.title: Attachment Id
attachmentID.description: The unique identifier of the attachment for which to retrieve entry totals.

tools.name: TONEDEN_GET_ATTACHMENT_UNLOCKS_BY_PLATFORM
tools.description: Tool to fetch counts of unlocks by platform for a specific attachment. Use when you need a breakdown of unlocks across platforms like Spotify, Twitter, etc.

attachmentID.title: Attachment Id
attachmentID.description: The unique identifier of the attachment for which to retrieve unlock counts by platform.

tools.name: TONEDEN_GET_ATTACHMENT_UNLOCKS_TIME_SERIES
tools.description: Tool to fetch time-series unlock statistics for a specific attachment. Use when you need chronological unlock data points for an attachment.

attachmentID.title: Attachment Id
attachmentID.description: The unique identifier of the attachment for which to retrieve unlock time-series data.

tools.name: TONEDEN_GET_LINK_INSIGHTS
tools.description: Tool to retrieve detailed insights for a ToneDen link. Use when you have a link ID and need metrics such as clicks, clickthroughs, email clicks, etc.

linkID.title: Link Id
linkID.description: The unique identifier of the link to retrieve insights for.

tools.name: TONEDEN_GET_LINK_INSIGHTS_OVERVIEW
tools.description: Tool to retrieve a summary overview of a link's performance insights. Use when you have a link ID and need aggregated metrics across platforms.

linkID.title: Link Id
linkID.description: The unique identifier of the link to retrieve insights for.

limit.title: Limit
limit.description: Maximum number of campaigns to return; must be >= 1.

offset.title: Offset
offset.description: Number of campaigns to skip before starting to collect the result set; must be >= 0.

inputSchema.description: Optional pagination parameters for listing playbook campaigns.

tools.name: TONEDEN_LIST_USER_ATTACHMENTS
tools.description: List User Attachments

userID.title: User Id
userID.description: ID of the user whose attachments to list. Use 'me' for current user.

tools.name: TONEDEN_UPDATE_ATTACHMENT
tools.description: Tool to update an existing attachment. Use when you need to flexibly modify any attachment field (or add custom fields) after its creation.

inputSchema.title: UpdateAttachmentRequest

type.title: Type
type.description: Attachment type: 'unlock' for social unlock or 'contest' for multi-action contest

update.title: Update
update.description: Additional arbitrary fields to merge into the update payload

platform.title: Platform
platform.description: Social action for single-action attachments. Required when type='unlock'

link_path.title: Link Path
link_path.description: Custom path segment for the attachment's landing page

platforms.title: Platforms
platforms.description: List of social actions for multi-action attachments. Required when type='contest'

unlock_text.title: Unlock Text
unlock_text.description: Coupon code text when unlock_type is 'coupon'

unlock_type.title: Unlock Type
unlock_type.description: Type of unlock for social unlock attachments

attachmentID.title: Attachment Id
attachmentID.description: ID of the attachment to update

download_url.title: Download Url
download_url.description: URL for download or link when unlock_type is 'download' or 'link'

messenger_page_id.title: Messenger Page Id
messenger_page_id.description: Facebook Page ID for Messenger subscriptions when platform='facebook-messenger'

inputSchema.description: Parameters for updating an existing attachment. Fields not provided will be omitted.

tools.name: TONEDEN_UPDATE_PLAYBOOK_CAMPAIGN
tools.description: Updates a ToneDen playbook campaign by ID using PUT /playbooks/campaigns/{campaignID}. Note: ToneDen's public docs do not expose the full request body schema for updates. This action sends a flexible JSON payload composed from provided fields and returns diagnostic information without raising on non-2xx responses, to aid real-world testing.

inputSchema.title: UpdatePlaybookCampaignRequest

notes.title: Notes
notes.description: Optional notes or description for the campaign

budget.title: Budget
budget.description: Optional budget value for the campaign

status.title: Status
status.description: Status of the campaign (if supported by API)

update.title: Update
update.description: Additional arbitrary fields for the update payload when not covered by explicit parameters

end_date.title: End Date
end_date.description: ISO8601 end date string (if supported by API)

metadata.title: Metadata
metadata.description: Arbitrary metadata dictionary to include in the update

start_date.title: Start Date
start_date.description: ISO8601 start date string (if supported by API)

campaign_id.title: Campaign Id
campaign_id.description: ID of the playbook campaign to update. Accepts string or int.

inputSchema.description: Request model for updating a ToneDen playbook campaign by ID.

tools.name: TONEDEN_UPDATE_USER
tools.description: Tool to update a ToneDen user's profile. Use when you need to modify user details (e.g., name, location, or settings) after fetching them.

inputSchema.title: UpdateUserRequest

city.title: City
city.description: City where the user is located

about.title: About
about.description: Bio or about text for the user

state.title: State
state.description: State or province of the user

policy.title: Policy
policy.description: Custom policy text for the user

user_id.title: User Id
user_id.description: ID of the user to update; use 'me' to target the current authenticated user

profile_url.title: Profile Url
profile_url.description: URL to the user's public profile page

display_name.title: Display Name
display_name.description: New display name for the user

additional_emails.title: Additional Emails
additional_emails.description: List of additional email addresses for the user
